featured.text: Over the course of an 80-year life span, the odds of being hit by lightning are 1 in 3,000, 21 the probability of being struck seven different times.

definition.zh_def: 概率是某事件發生的可能性，通常以0到1之間的數字表示。
definition.en_def: Probability is the measure of the likelihood that an event will occur, expressed as a number between 0 and 1.
definition.example: The probability of rolling a six on a fair die is one in six.
